On the higher end, Ralph Lauren (RL) and Nordstrom JWN (JWN) open their books this week, as do bargain retailers Dollar General (DG DG ) and Dollar Tree DLTR (DLTR). It could be interesting to see how much online sales helped RL and JWN weather the coronavirus-sparked shopping downturn as well as how much people were stocking up on lower cost goods during the pandemic.
